name: Judgement one
script:
cecho("\n<red>".. string.format("%s started judging you (1/4)!", matches[2]))

wsys.setPrefixWarning(matches[2].." judging you", 2)
matches: ^(\w+) raises (?:his|her) .+ mace over you to pass judgement on your sins, and it begins to crackle with righteous fire\.$
^(\w+) raises .+ mace over you to pass judgement on your sins, and it begins to crackle with righteous fire\.$
